alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville; Laurens; Northern Spartanburg; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 9:35PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, east central Greenville and west central Spartanburg Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 935 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Five Forks, or 12 miles east of Greenville Downtown, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greer, Simpsonville, Five Forks, Duncan, Lyman, Wellford, Reidville, GSP Airport, and Moore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Greenville; Laurens; Northern Spartanburg; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg
